name: Jewel Snake (LeslieLlama)
description:
An ultraquick mashup of two ancient beasts of game design, Snake and Bejewled! my entry for the Friday Night Game jam #2022-39

Move the snake with the arrow keys, and eat gems to grow longer. match the eaten gems within your body to clear them and gain points. don't bonk into the edges! 

unlike ordinary snake, you can cross yourself atm, not intentional but I still don't really recommend it since it makes things even more visually confusing than they are already >w<
